ref: 8526 práṇayati ʻ conveys (esp. fire or water or soma to its place) ʼ RV., ʻ inflicts punishment ʼ Mn., práṇayatē ʻ draws in (breath) ʼ ŚBr. [√nī1]
Pa. paṇēti ʻ brings out ʼ, daṇḍaṁ p˚ ʻ decrees a punishment ʼ;
Or. paṇibā ʻ to push in (rice into pounding machine), fill up with, adminster (blows), swallow greedily ʼ.
